graph_metadata.title: Comprehensive US Government Fraud Knowledge Graph
graph_metadata.description: Comprehensive mapping of fraud types, cases, organizations, individuals, and agencies across all US government sectors (2000-2025). Includes military, defense contractors, corporate, and financial fraud.
data_sources: Department of Justice Official Press Releases

fraud_schemes.name: False Dependent Claims
fraud_schemes.description: Service members claim dependents they don't have to receive higher allowances
fraud_schemes.impact: Increases housing allowance or other family-based benefits

sources.title: GAO Report: Military Personnel - Better Oversight of Dependent Data Could Reduce Millions in Erroneous Pay
DoD OIG: Basic Allowance for Housing Fraud Detection

fraud_schemes.name: False Address Claims
fraud_schemes.description: Service members provide false addresses to obtain location-based higher rates
fraud_schemes.impact: Increases BAH based on high-cost areas

sources.title: Military Times: BAH Fraud Cases on the Rise
DoD Financial Management Regulation Vol 7A: BAH Requirements
DOJ Press Release: Military Couple Pleads Guilty to Sham Marriage BAH Fraud
NCIS Investigation: Contract Marriage Fraud Schemes

fraud_schemes.name: Dual BAH Claims
fraud_schemes.description: Married service members both claiming separate BAH

sources.title: Defense Finance and Accounting Service: BAH Dual-Military Guidance

fraud_schemes.name: False Injury/Disability Claims
fraud_schemes.description: Veterans claim injuries or disabilities they don't have
fraud_schemes.impact: Monthly disability payments plus ancillary benefits

fraud_schemes.description: Claim military service and combat awards never actually earned
